name: Batman
quote: The most important thing in life is to be yourself. Unless you can be Batman. Always be Batman.

name: Catwoman
quote: I must continue my quest to slay the red dot.

name: Hulk
quote: Grrr whhh aaaah grrr whaaa grrr aaaaaaaahhgggr waahhh.

name: Harry Potter
quote: If you're havin' Quidditch problems I feel bad for you son. I got 99 problems but a snitch ain't one.

name: Iron Man
quote: In the fourth grade, my robotics teacher told me to build a little robot for the science fair. I finished it in a few hours and called it 'Optimus Prime'.

name: Spiderman
quote: I'm not saying I'm Spiderman. I'm just saying nobody has ever seen me and Spiderman in a room together.

name: Wolverine
quote: The only Canadian who isn't sorry.

name: Thor
quote: I'm up all night to get Loki.

name: Wonder Women
quote: I'm 'Wonder Woman'. I wonder where I left my keys, I wonder where I put my purse, I wonder where my money went.
